name: Definitions
text:
As used in this part:
	"Department" means the department of health.
	"Director" means the director of health.
	"Facial tattoo" means any tattoo applied above the jawline, anterior to the ear and frontal hairline including the eyelids, eyebrows, or lips.
	"Tattoo artist" means any person who creates indelible marks or decorative designs by introducing pigments beneath the surface of the skin with the aid of needles, or other devices. [L 1990, c 285, pt of §2]
